name: Ability
desc: Abilities that measure physical and mental characteristics.

name: abbreviation
desc: Three-letter abbreviation of the ability.

name: byAbbreviation
desc: Returns the ability with the given abbreviation, which must exist.

name: byName
desc: Returns the ability with the given name.

name: checkExample
desc: A description of what an ability check might use this ability for.

name: compareTo
desc: Compares this object to another object.

name: description
desc: A description of what the ability measures, or its purpose.

name: savingThrowExample
desc: A description of what a savings throw might use this ability for.

name: skills
desc: Skill checks that use this ability.

name: tryByAbbreviation
desc:
Returns the ability with the given abbreviation, or null if none
exists.

name: tryByName
desc: Returns the ability with the exact name, or null if none exists.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: AbilityScore
desc: Ability score, or the amount of an Ability a character or creature has.

name: AbilityScore
desc: Creates a new ability score.

name: ability
desc: The ability the score is for.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: maxScore
desc: The maximum possible ability score.

name: minScore
desc: The minimum possible ability score a score can normally be.

name: modifier
desc: The modifier for the ability score.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: score
desc: Amount of an ability a character or creature has.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: Action
desc: Describes doing something other than moving or communicating.

name: Action
desc: Creates a new action with the given name.

name: attack
desc: Attack with a weapon or unarmed strike.

name: compareTo
desc: Compares this object to another object.

name: dash
desc: Grant extra movement equal to your speed for the rest of the turn.

name: disengage
desc: Movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks for the rest of the turn.

name: dodge
desc:
Until the start of your next turn, attacks against you have
Circumstance.disadvantage.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: help
desc:
Help another creature's ability check or attack roll, or administer first
aid.

name: hide
desc: Make a Ability.dexterity (Skill.stealth) check.

name: influence
desc:
Make a Ability.charisma (Skill.deception, Skill.intimidation,
Skill.performance, or Skill.persuasion) or Ability.wisdom
(Skill.animalHandling) check to alter a creature's attitude.

name: magic
desc: Cast a spell, use a magic item, or use a magical feature.

name: main
desc: All main actions.

name: name
desc: Name of the action.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: ready
desc: Prepare to take an action in response to a trigger you define.

name: search
desc:
Make a Ability.wisdom (Skill.insight, Skill.medicine,
Skill.perception, or Skill.survival) check.

name: study
desc:
Make a Ability.intelligence (Skill.arcana, Skill.history,
Skill.investigation, Skill.nature, or Skill.religion) check.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: utilize
desc: Use a non-magical item.

name: ArmorClass
desc: How well a creature or character avoids being wounded in combat.

name: ArmorClass
desc: Creates a new armor class.

name: compareTo
desc: Compares this object to another object.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: substanceExamples
desc: An example list of armor classes for object substances.

name: toDifficultyClass
desc: Converts the armor class to a difficulty class.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: value
desc: The value of the armor class.

name: ChallengeRating
desc: A rating of the threat a monster poses to a group of four player characters.

name: ChallengeRating
desc: Creates a new challenge rating.

name: compareTo
desc: Compares this object to another object.

name: denominator
desc: The denominator of the challenge rating.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: numerator
desc: The numerator of the challenge rating.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: proficiencyBonus
desc: The proficiency bonus for the challenge rating.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: value
desc: The value of the challenge rating as a floating-point number.

name: Circumstance
desc: Whether an ability test is at advantage or disadvantage.

name: combine
desc: Returns the result of combining multiple possible circumstances.

name: pick
desc: Returns the result of rolling with advantage or disadvantage.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: Condition
desc: A condition that affects a creature's capabilities.

name: blinded
desc: The blinded condition.

name: charmed
desc: The charmed condition.

name: deafened
desc: The deafened condition.

name: effects
desc: Effects that are associated with this condition.

name: exhausted
desc: The exhausted condition.

name: frightened
desc: The frightened condition.

name: grappled
desc: The grappled condition.

name: incapacitated
desc: The incapacitated condition.

name: invisible
desc: The invisible condition.

name: name
desc: Name of the condition.

name: paralyzed
desc: The paralyzed condition.

name: petrified
desc: The petrified condition.

name: poisoned
desc: The poisoned condition.

name: prone
desc: The prone condition.

name: restrained
desc: The restrained condition.

name: stunned
desc: The stunned condition.

name: unconscious
desc: The unconscious condition.

name: values
desc: List of conditions, including a single level of exhaustion.

name: Cover
desc: Obstacles can make a target more difficult to harm.

name: bonusToACAndDexteritySavingThrows
desc: Amount of bonus to Armor Class and Dexterity saving throws.

name: compareTo
desc: Compares this object to another object.

name: exampleWhenApplied
desc: Example of when the cover is applied.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: Dice
desc: Dice add randomness to the game and determine the outcome of many actions.

name: byName
desc: Returns the dice with the given name.

name: bySides
desc: Returns the dice with the given number of sides.

name: compareTo
desc: Compares this object to another object.

name: operator *
desc: Creates a dice notation of amount dice with this die and no modifier.

name: operator +
desc: Creates a dice notation of one die with this die and the given modifier.

name: sides
desc: The number of sides on the die.

name: tryByName
desc: Returns the dice with the given name, if it exists.

name: tryBySides
desc: Returns the dice with the given number of sides, if it exists.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: DiceNotation
desc: A notation for dice expressions.

name: DiceNotation
desc: Creates a new dice notation.

name: DiceNotation.parse
desc: Parses a dice notation from a string, which must be a valid dice notation.

name: amount
desc: The number of dice to roll.

name: average
desc: The average result of rolling this dice notation.

name: dice
desc: Which dice to roll.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: modifier
desc: A modifier to apply to the result.

name: operator +
desc: Creates a new dice notation with the modifier increased by value.

name: operator -
desc: Creates a new dice notation with the modifier decreased by value.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: tryParse
desc: Parses a dice notation from a string.

name: DifficultyClass
desc: The difficulty class of a task.

name: DifficultyClass
desc: Creates a new difficulty class.

name: DifficultyClass.fromArmorClass
desc: Creates a new difficulty class from an armor class.

name: compareTo
desc: Compares this object to another object.

name: examples
desc: An example list of difficulty classes.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: value
desc: The value of the difficulty class.

name: Effect
desc: Reflects a temporary or permanent change in a creature's capabilities.

name: Effect
desc: Creates a new effect.

name: Effect.constant
desc: Creates a new effect from compile-time constants.

name: description
desc: Description of the effect.

name: id
desc: Unique string identifier for the effect.

name: name
desc: Name of the effect.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: Example
desc: Represents a non-canonical example of a value type with a textual name.

name: Example
desc: Creates a new example with the given value and name.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: name
desc: Name of the example.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: value
desc: Value of the example.

name: Exhaustion
desc: The exhaustion condition, which unlike other conditions, is cumulative.

name: Exhaustion
desc: Creates a new exhaustion condition.

name: compareTo
desc: Compares this object to another object.

name: effects
desc: Effects that are associated with this condition.

name: increase
desc: Returns a new exhaustion condition based on adding an additional level.

name: level
desc: Level of exhaustion.

name: maxLevel
desc: The maximum level of exhaustion.

name: minLevel
desc: The minimum level of exhaustion.

name: name
desc: Name of the condition.

name: reduce
desc: Returns a new exhaustion condition based on reducing the level by 1.

name: Hazard
desc: TODO: https://www.dndbeyond.com/sources/dnd/free-rules/playing-the-game#Hazards.

name: Level
desc: A level of a player character.

name: Level
desc: Creates a new level.

name: compareTo
desc: Compares this object to another object.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: isMaxLevel
desc: Whether the level is the maximum level.

name: maxLevel
desc: The maximum level a player character can be.

name: minValue
desc: The minimum level a player character can be.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: proficiencyBonus
desc: The proficiency bonus for the level.

name: toNextLevel
desc: Returns the next level.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: value
desc: The value of the level.

name: Light
desc: Determines the category of illumnation in an area.

name: compareTo
desc: Compares this object to another object.

name: obscured
desc: The level of obscurity in this light, if any.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: Obscured
desc: Defines the ability to hinder vision in an area.

name: compareTo
desc: Compares this object to another object.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: ProficiencyBonus
desc: Reflects the impact that training has on the creature’s capabilities.

name: ProficiencyBonus
desc: Creates a new proficiency bonus.

name: ProficiencyBonus.fromChallengeRating
desc: Determines the proficiency bonus based on the given ChallengeRating.

name: ProficiencyBonus.fromLevel
desc: Determines the proficiency bonus based on the given player Level.

name: compareTo
desc: Compares this object to another object.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: value
desc: Value of the proficiency bonus.

name: Sense
desc: Special senses that help creatures perceive things in certain situations.

name: Sense
desc: Creates a new sense with the given name and effects.

name: blindsight
desc: See within a specific range without relying on physical sight

name: compareTo
desc: Compares this object to another object.

name: darkvision
desc: See better in non-bright light.

name: effects
desc: Effects that are associated with this condition.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: name
desc: Name of the sense.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: tremorsense
desc: Can pinpoint the location of creatures and moving objects.

name: truesight
desc: See in normal and magical darkness.

name: Skill
desc: A category of things a creature or character might do with an ability check.

name: ability
desc: Which base ability is used for the skill.

name: checkExample
desc: An example of a skill check that might use this skill.

name: compareTo
desc: Compares this object to another object.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: Source
desc: A source provides a canonical representation of game specifications.

name: Source
desc: Creates a new source with the given name and version.

name: Source.latest
desc: Creates a new source with the given name.

name: freeRules
desc: Everything you need to get started playing D&D!

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: name
desc: The name of the source.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: url
desc: An optional link to the source as a URL.

name: version
desc: The version of the source.
